sentences.en: After months of staying well out of the problem, Washington has expressed a willingness to help find a solution.
sentences.cn: 几个月以来都不曾介入该问题的华盛顿方面已表示愿意帮助寻求解决方案。

sentences.en: Ask young Harry to do it — he's still an eager beaver and wants to impress by his willingness.
sentences.cn: 请年轻的亨利干吧——他仍然是个雄心勃勃的人,并努力使人对他的投入留下深刻印象.

sentences.en: But when we focus on God and His ability and willingness to help us in every way -- all our excuses become insignificant.
sentences.cn: 但是当我们聚焦在神时，他的能力和意愿会用任何方法去帮助我们---我们所有的借口都变得毫无意义。

sentences.en: He fairly outstripped himself in willingness and civility; he was all smiles at everyone.
sentences.cn: 他刻意显得惟命是听、彬彬有礼, 对每个人都满脸堆笑.

sentences.en: Her actions testify her willingness to help.
sentences.cn: 她的事迹体现了她助人为乐的精神.

sentences.en: His presence is indicative of his willingness to help.
sentences.cn: 他的出席表示他愿意帮忙.

sentences.en: His willingness to work redeemed him in her eyes.
sentences.cn: 他心甘情愿地干活,改善了她对他的印象.

sentences.en: In fact, the willingness to experiment is one of the most striking features of China today.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 敢于实验是今日中国最引人注目的特点.

sentences.en: It is unwise of them to advertise their willingness to make concessions at the negotiations.
sentences.cn: 他们宣扬愿意在谈判中让步,这是不明智的.

sentences.en: Maud sounded her on her willingness to take up the job.
sentences.cn: 莫德试探了一下她是否愿意做这个工作.

sentences.en: Self-discipline, willingness, enthusiasm, that's what you must depend on.
sentences.cn: 自律、自愿与热情，这是你所必须依仗的。

sentences.en: She did not credit her willingness to go to any fascination Hurstwood held for her.
sentences.cn: 她并不认为她愿意去的原因是因为赫斯渥对她有吸引力.

sentences.en: So we do believe we have improved the willingness of our people for our acceptance in the future.
sentences.cn: 因此，我们确实认为，我们已经使群众发生变化，愿意将来接受我们的领导。

sentences.en: That provides a measure of willingness to punish, even at a cost to the punisher.
sentences.cn: 这提供了一个对惩罚的愿意程度的衡量手段，即使惩罚有代价。

sentences.en: They tried to assure him of their willingness to work.
sentences.cn: 他们尽力使他相信他们乐意工作.

sentences.en: This fully demonstrates their willingness to cooperate.
sentences.cn: 这充分表明他们愿意合作.

sentences.en: We must respond to well-founded criticism with a willingness to change.
sentences.cn: 对于有根有据的批评，我们必须乐意作出改变。

sentences.en: Workers'leaders have expressed their willingness to cooperate.
sentences.cn: 工人领袖们表达了合作的意愿.

words.tran_cn: 乐意的；自愿的；心甘情愿的
意志；情感；遗嘱；意图；心愿
决心；用意志力驱使；将（财产等）遗赠某人（will的现在分词）
决心要；遗赠；用意志力使
乐意；心甘情愿；自动自发
